title: ZSMEiE Toruń
description: ZSMEiE is a vocational secondary school in Toruń. I graduated from this school in 2024 with honors. My specialization was software developer technician. During my education, I learned the basics of programming, databases, and web development.

title: Łódź University of Technology
description: I started my studies at International Faculty of Engineering in 2024. My major is Information Technology. I want to enhance my programming skills and learn new technologies.
